xtc.lang.cpp
Class MacroTable

java.lang.Object
  xtc.lang.cpp.MacroTable

public class MacroTable
extends Object

The conditional macro table. A few properties: (1) no entry means the macro is free, (2) the union of all entry's conditions is TRUE, (3) each entry's definitions' conditions are disjoint, (4) there is at most one free and one undefined element (5) the table is optimized by having no duplicate definitions

Version:
$Revision: 1.52 $

Method Detail

define

public void define(String name,
                   MacroTable.Macro macro,
                   xtc.lang.cpp.ContextManager contextManager)
Define a macro under a given context. This function will ensure that all conditions are disjoint and that there are no more than one of each unique definition.

_define

protected void _define(String name,
                       MacroTable.Macro macro,
                       xtc.lang.cpp.ContextManager.Context context)
Update the symbol table with a new entry. The context passed will gain a reference, so dereference it yourself if you no longer need it.

rectifyGuard

public void rectifyGuard(String guardMacro,
                         xtc.lang.cpp.ContextManager contextManager)
Update the contexts of macros that use a guard macro. We assume that guard macros for headers are undefined, not free.

Parameters:
guardMacro - The name of the guard macro.
contextManager - The context manager.

undefine

public void undefine(String name,
                     xtc.lang.cpp.ContextManager contextManager)
Undefine a macro under the given context.

get

public List<MacroTable.Entry> get(String name,
                                  xtc.lang.cpp.ContextManager contextManager)
Gets the macro table entries of the given macro under the given context. Any entries not valid in the context will not be returned. The actual table entries are returned, so they shouldn't be modified.

free

public void free(List<MacroTable.Entry> entries)

contains

Whether the table already contains the macro name.

countDefinitions

public int countDefinitions(String name)
Count the number of definitions a given macro has. Does not include FREE or UNDEFINED entries in the macro table.

Parameters:
name - The macro name.
Returns:
The number of definitions of the macro.
